summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the test, suggesting that there might be severe performance bottlenecks. It is essential to investigate and address these issues promptly to ensure a smooth user experience.
  - Recommendation: Analyze the waterfall chart, server logs, and browser console to identify the root cause of the performance degradation. Common issues include heavy JavaScript files, unoptimized images, render-blocking CSS, and slow server response times.

issues.recommendation: Analyze the waterfall chart, server logs, and browser console to identify the root cause of the performance degradation. Common issues include heavy JavaScript files, unoptimized images, render-blocking CSS, and slow server response times.
